verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:15
verses.text: And David called one of the young men, and said, Go near, and fall upon him. And he smote him that he died.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:16
verses.text: And David said unto him, Thy blood be upon thy head; for thy mouth hath testified against thee, saying, I have slain the Lord’s anointed.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:17
verses.text: And David lamented with this lamentation over Saul and over Jonathan his son:

verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:18
verses.text: (Also he bade them teach the children of Judah the use of the bow: behold, it is written in the book of Jasher.)

verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:19
verses.text: The beauty of Israel is slain upon thy high places: how are the mighty fallen!
